headline: STERIS (STE) Is Up 10.1% After Strong Q2 Results and Reaffirmed Revenue Guidance
summary: STERIS plc recently reported strong second quarter results, with sales rising to US$1.46 billion and net income reaching US$191.9 million, both up significantly from the prior year, and confirmed its fiscal 2026 revenue growth guidance of 8-9%. The company also announced a quarterly dividend of US$0.63 per share, highlighting its continued focus on shareholder returns amid robust operating performance. We’ll now explore how STERIS’s reaffirmed revenue guidance and solid earnings growth...
